metadata.Title: CVE-2016-2124

Platform: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 12 SP3
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 12 SP4
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 12 SP5

metadata.Description: A flaw was found in the way samba implemented SMB1 authentication. An attacker could use this flaw to retrieve the plaintext password sent over the wire even if Kerberos authentication was required.

criterions.comment: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 12 SP2-BCL is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 12 SP5 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 12 SP5 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 12 SP3 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 12 SP4 is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 12 SP3-BCL is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 12 SP3-TERADATA is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 12 SP3-LTSS is installed
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 12 SP4-LTSS is installed

SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 12 SP4-ESPOS is installed
